info.description: This is a chevron remote-signer server
info.title: Remote Signer API

post.summary: This signs the request with the key that the specified token is using.

parameters.description: Proxy Token generated with agentAdmin. It is required if running with authentication enabled
parameters.name: proxyToken

parameters.description: Target server URL. Defaults to environment variable AGENT_TARGET_URL
parameters.name: serverUrl

parameters.description: POST Content to send signed to the target server. The message body will be sent to the target server with it's signature in a header field named 'signature'.
parameters.name: message

post.summary: This is the GraphQL Endpoint for administration of the agent proxy tokens.

parameters.description: Proxy Token of the admin user. It is required for all calls besides the login
parameters.name: proxyToken

parameters.description: The JSON content of the graphql query
parameters.name: message

post.summary: Encrypt JSON fields to specified gpg keys.
Decrypt JSON fields from specified gpg keys.
Decrypts data using loaded GPG Private Key
Encrypts data for a GPG Key

parameters.description: Information to encrypt to public key
parameters.name: message

post.description: Generates a new GPG Key by specifying the Identifier, Bits and Password

parameters.description: Information to generate the key. The minimum acceptable bits is 2048.
parameters.name: message

post.description: Signs a payload using the specified GPG key and returns the signature in GPG Format
post.summary: Signs a payload in GPG Format

post.description: Signs a payload using the specified GPG key and returns the signature in Quanto Format
post.summary: Signs a payload in Quanto Format

post.description: Unlocks a locked pre-loaded key inside remote signer

post.summary: Verifies a signature in GPG Format

parameters.description: Information to verify a signature in GPG format
parameters.name: message

post.summary: Verifies a signature in Quanto Format

parameters.description: Information to verify a signature in quanto format
parameters.name: message

parameters.description: HKP Operation. Valid values: get, index, vindex
parameters.name: op

parameters.description: HKP Operation options. Valid values: mr, nm
parameters.name: options

post.summary: Adds a public key to the server
Adds a private key to the server

get.summary: Fetches a list of cached keys in the server

post.summary: Delete a private key from the server

get.summary: Fetches a public key from the server

parameters.description: Fingerprint of the key you want to fetch
parameters.name: fingerPrint

get.summary: Fetches a list of loaded private keys in the server
Search for GPG keys by using it all fields.

parameters.description: Value of the key you want to fetch
parameters.name: valueData

get.summary: Search for GPG keys by using it's email field.

parameters.description: Email of the key you want to fetch
parameters.name: email

get.summary: Search for GPG keys by using it's fingerprint field.

parameters.description: Fingerprint of the key you want to fetch
parameters.name: fingerPrint

get.summary: Search for GPG keys by using it's identifier name field.

parameters.description: Name of the key you want to fetch
parameters.name: name

get.summary: Checks if Remote-Signer and all its dependencies are working
